reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan lightweight and suitable for Houston weather, with a nice fit and good quality as a wardrobe staple.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars No buttons but still a great simple cardigan
items.body: Love this light weight jacket. It kept me warm during the summer Air conditioning and gave me a secure feeling of comfort at work. Style is simple and functions great for me. No shrinking and durable material that has lasted me months now. Fits me well. Read more
items.author: Sonya K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and yummy
items.body: Purchased for a Disney Bound of The Princess and the Frog. It was lightweight and easy to wear on a hot summer day in the park. The style was just perfect and had the amount of coverage I needed. Fit well and was soft to the touch. I got a lot of compliments on it and have been able to wear it again. Read more
items.author: Liz

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and comfortable.
items.body: Light weight comfortable and just long enough. Nice for going out for dinner or for a little warmth in air conditioning. Price was right too. Read more
items.author: Brenda W

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Flattering Fit
items.body: The red is a bit brighter than I wanted, but it still looks great. The fit is very flattering. The fabric is lightweight and soft. I bought it for travel, and it's exactly what I wanted. I bought one in black as well. Read more
items.author: CKA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Soft and much warmer than it looks! I bought 2! Goes with everything and covers what you want covered ðŸ˜Š perfect length and fit! Material is perfect and very comfortable! Read more
items.author: Mona Hutcheson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek, versatile and professional for work/date
items.body: Absolutely gorgeous color and true to size. This is a lightweight cardigan - not meant to be something of substantial warmth if you are in a snow storm. I live in Las Vegas so this is the perfect fall cover up for fall for casual office or a good fall sunny day outside. It is thin - but meant to be that way. I bought it because it is stylish and sleek and not bulky for those days when you need a little something for warmth but not a giant parka. Love it. Matching it with boot and leggings for the fall. Read more
items.author: Cruzam

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent item, all year wearing.
items.body: Light, dressy, excellent fit. Can wear for everyday and dress up, highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Maggie Cannon

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, soft, runs a bit large for petite ladies
items.body: I'm keeping two of these as they're very comfortable and lightweight enough to be a nice summer cardigan (I live in the deep south where I still need to carry a jacket in the summer due to strong AC everywhere). The material is a thin stretchy fabric that's soft to wear. I haven't washed mine yet, so I don't know if they will pill with age/time. FYI, the A18 Fp-wide Stripe Pink doesn't match the image in the listing. The colors match, but instead of thick stripes, it's the same 1-inch thin stripes as seen in the A23 Fp-stripe Brown color. I'm returning mine because it doesn't look as good as the image. I'm 5'1" and 109lbs and the Small is just a bit large; the sleeves are a little bit long and loose so it's not perfectly form fitting, but I think it'll shrink after a few washes, so I'll take the risk. Read more
items.author: AmazonShopper

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A09 Dark Green, A08 Orange, A27 Fp-blue Orange Block, A20 Fp-ld Khaki, A17 Fp-blue Yellow Flower, A26 Fp-black White Branch, A23 Fp-stripe Brown, A03 Fp-black Christmas Gift, A21 Fp-beige Apricot Plaid, A25 Fp-beige Gray Geometry, A28 Fp-cashew Navy, A10 Fp-navy Blue Big Flower, A03 Fp-red Black Plaid Bomb, A01 Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
